extension.summary: News from Germany's public broadcaster ARD
extension.description: Die Nachrichten der ARD mit aktuellen Videos, kompletten Sendungen und Hintergrundberichten.
News in German from Germany's trusted public broadcaster ARD, featuring current videos, complete broadcasts and background information.
